lines.text:
[smelling smoke in Juliane's apartment]
How many rooms are burning so far?
No rooms. Only lies.
Do you think, being in such pain, I'd drink apple juice?
Will that hurt?
Probably. More often than not, the injection isn't working With alcoholics.
Your friend is a horrible person.
Without teeth, he would be charming.
Well, we only pulled one out so far.

[when Jürgen is seeking for an excuse to stay at her apartment overnight]
What are they exhibiting?
Well, pictures - and flowers, at "Planten un Blomen".
Now, in October?
Well, hardy flowers.
Forgive me that it's me.
Forgive me that it's me, too.
Why do you want to make the movie, if you don't like the story?
I like the characters so much.

[to Juliane]
From now on, publicity will be more important than talent, you'll have to get used to that, Miss Thomas. Sometimes I even think that talent can hinder you.
You can't have made negative experiences on this point, Sonnylein.
We were introduced to the screenplay by Mr. Kolbe, he is a friend of Miss Thomas.
So, why aren't you in the script?

[When questioned why he brought his son to the dinner party]
What should I do with him? He won't stay in the trunk.
That's way to immoral.That happens in life, not on screen.
Here's to the "Zürcher Verlobung"! A good title, by the way.
Distribution will change it.
With a good story, it isn't important if it really happened.

[when Juliane is applying make-up]
You don't have to paint yourself, it's already dark, man!
Sleep well together!
Who's that girl, your secretary or something?
That's no secretary and no something.
Why do you take a picture when you can have me?
Now, what is supposed to happen in that mountain cabin? I mean, does it happen, or doesn't it?
Of course it happens. But tenderly, on a higher level.
2024 metres above sea-level.
Juliette?

[expecting a kiss]
Yes, Jean?
Would you like to take a look at our cabin guestbook?
What are you having?
Tea.
What kind of immoral behavior has broken loose here?

[about his interrupting Jean's and Juliane's tête-à-tête]
I would be angry, in the reverse case.
Well, I wouldn't have come here, in the reverse case.
Jean, you have one big fault.
Yes?
None.
Miss Thomas is already hallucinating.
Can one do anything against that?
Stop drinking.
Or continue drinking.
People are romantic. They don't want to see on screen what they have at home every day.

[about Pips]
He said that if I talked, he'd scalp me.

[about boarding school]
Will they take me if I have bad reports?
Even more so.
And if they're good?
Do you believe in good reports?
Do you want to postpone filmmaking till I have my own experiences for the ending, too?
My aunt reached the age of 108. We already thought we'd have to have her put to sleep.
Miss Thomas, a telegram arrived for you this afternoon. But there hasn't happened anything bad.

[director cameo]
Well, I don't know. I don't think it's right if a director plays a part in his own movie.
